html: The long-awaited Mueller Report is here, and there is NO collusion, NO obstruction, NO executive privilege asserted! It's time for ALL of Congress to get focused and get back to work.
text: The long-awaited Mueller Report is here, and there is NO collusion, NO obstruction, NO executive privilege asserted! It's time for ALL of Congress to get focused and get back to work.

html: Reminder: today when you hear people seizing on the idea that Mueller didn't "prove innocence," remember—that was never Mueller's job. Prosecutors do not set out to prove a negative. They look for evidence to establish a case. They didn't have one. It was never there. It's over.
text: Reminder: today when you hear people seizing on the idea that Mueller didn't "prove innocence," remember—that was never Mueller's job. Prosecutors do not set out to prove a negative. They look for evidence to establish a case. They didn't have one. It was never there. It's over.

html: Seeing more claims that because the President was unhappy about being investigated, he must be guilty. Hard to call this critique anything other than completely unserious. Would you be happy about being accused and subsequently investigated for a crime you did not commit?
text: Seeing more claims that because the President was unhappy about being investigated, he must be guilty. Hard to call this critique anything other than completely unserious. Would you be happy about being accused and subsequently investigated for a crime you did not commit?

html: I am pleased that the Mueller report has concluded so that Congress can get back to legislating and begin fixing our broken infrastructure system and other problems. I hope my Democratic colleagues can put partisan politics aside and return to normalcy. There was no collusion.
text: I am pleased that the Mueller report has concluded so that Congress can get back to legislating and begin fixing our broken infrastructure system and other problems. I hope my Democratic colleagues can put partisan politics aside and return to normalcy. There was no collusion.

html: I voted for the release of the Mueller report because I value transparency in government and all of my constituents should be able to read the document, firsthand. Now it’s been released and it’s very clear- absolutely no collusion.

@DHSgov reports that illegal traffic has dropped:
-- over 95% in Yuma since 2005
-- over 90% in Tucson since 2004
-- over 92% in the San Diego area since 1996

All because sections of the border were secured with fencing and walls.

text:
U.S. laws are out of touch with mainstream America. 

81% believe abortion should be generally illegal in the 3rd trimester. 

65% believe it should be generally illegal in the 2nd trimester. 

6 in 10 Americans do not want their taxes to fund abortion.

html: Colorado has the 12th highest rate of abuse of prescription opioids in the nation. It's a problem around the country. A national crisis requires a national response, and I’ve helped pass more than 30 bills to that end. I am committed to combatting the opioid crisis.pic.twitter.com/GguKrcZsN8

html: For many of our African American brothers and sisters, June 19 is as important as July 4. Let’s join them together in celebrating true independence and strive to understand their struggles. We will never forget the millions who suffered under the injustice of slavery. 2/
text:
For many of our African American brothers and sisters, June 19 is as important as July 4. 

Let’s join them together in celebrating true independence and strive to understand their struggles. 

We will never forget the millions who suffered under the injustice of slavery. 2/

html: Many of us celebrate American independence on July 4th. However, June 19 is a symbolic date representing the day ALL Americans became free and independent – when slavery ended. It started in Texas in 1865 when 250,000 enslaved people were liberated. Now it's called Juneteenth. 1/
text: Many of us celebrate American independence on July 4th. However, June 19 is a symbolic date representing the day ALL Americans became free and independent – when slavery ended. It started in Texas in 1865 when 250,000 enslaved people were liberated. Now it's called Juneteenth. 1/

html: The @USDOT announcement is a huge win for the entire Pikes Peak region. It’s undeniable that our district needed this $65 million grant in order to improve the I-25 gap. I'll continue working with this Administration to secure federal funding for Colorado’s Fifth.
text:
The @USDOT announcement is a huge win for the entire Pikes Peak region. 

It’s undeniable that our district needed this $65 million grant in order to improve the I-25 gap. 

I'll continue working with this Administration to secure federal funding for Colorado’s Fifth.

html: .@USDOT announced El Paso County will receive funds to widen an approximately 18-mile segment of I-25 from Monument to Castle Rock. As I’ve worked with the Trump Administration over the last several months, my number one priority has been to secure this $65 million grant.
text:
.@USDOT announced El Paso County will receive funds to widen an approximately 18-mile segment of I-25 from Monument to Castle Rock. 

As I’ve worked with the Trump Administration over the last several months, my number one priority has been to secure this $65 million grant.

html: This happy occasion brings tons of positive changes! Lower tax rates for Americans that let families keep more of their hard-earned money.
text: This happy occasion brings tons of positive changes! Lower tax rates for Americans that let families keep more of their hard-earned money.

html: Today, Tuesday, April 17, will be the last time families have to file their taxes using the outdated, burdensome, overly-complicated tax code from 1986.
text: Today, Tuesday, April 17, will be the last time families have to file their taxes using the outdated, burdensome, overly-complicated tax code from 1986.

html: #5: Relief from Obamacare The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act repeals Obamacare’s unpopular and ineffective individual mandate. By eliminating this unfair tax, Americans will no longer be forced to buy government-mandated health insurance they don’t want.
text:
#5: Relief from Obamacare
The Tax Cuts and Jobs Act repeals Obamacare’s unpopular and ineffective individual mandate. By eliminating this unfair tax, Americans will no longer be forced to buy government-mandated health insurance they don’t want.

html: #4: A Simpler Process Next April will bring a lot of relief to the yearly hassle of filing taxes. The new law is designed to enable Americans to file their taxes in a simple and straightforward way.
text:
#4: A Simpler Process
Next April will bring a lot of relief to the yearly hassle of filing taxes. The new law is designed to enable Americans to file their taxes in a simple and straightforward way.

html: #3: Doubling the Child Tax Credit to Help Families The new code doubles the Child Tax Credit from $1,000 to $2,000 and makes it available to more families across the country dealing with the costs of raising a family.
text:
#3: Doubling the Child Tax Credit to Help Families
The new code doubles the Child Tax Credit from $1,000 to $2,000 and makes it available to more families across the country dealing with the costs of raising a family.

html: #2: Nearly Doubled Standard Deduction The new code will increase the standard deduction to $12,000 for individuals and $24,000 for married couples – nearly double the amounts available under the old tax code. This will protect more income from taxes.
text:
#2: Nearly Doubled Standard Deduction
The new code will increase the standard deduction to $12,000 for individuals and  $24,000 for married couples – nearly double the amounts available under the old tax code. This will protect more income from taxes.

html: #1: Lower Tax Rates for All Americans With lower tax rates, Americans in every community will be able to keep more of their hard-earned money to save or spend as they see fit. In fact, a typical family of four earning $75,000 will see a tax cut of more than $2,000.
text:
#1: Lower Tax Rates for All Americans 
With lower tax rates, Americans in every community will be able to keep more of their hard-earned money to save or spend as they see fit. In fact, a typical family of four earning $75,000 will see a tax cut of more than $2,000.

html: I cosponsored the National Suicide Prevention Hotline Improvement Act. This is an important matter, particularly for many of our nation's veterans. Mental health matters too. Those who need to talk can call the national suicide prevention lifeline at 1-800-273-8255. #StopSuicide
text:
I cosponsored the National Suicide Prevention Hotline Improvement Act. This is an important matter, particularly for many of our nation's veterans. Mental health matters too.

Those who need to talk can call the national suicide prevention lifeline at 1-800-273-8255. #StopSuicide

html: It gives veterans full authority to use the existing VA system or not. This bill means veterans, especially those with extreme disabilities, can expect to have their needs taken care of quickly and efficiently.
text: It gives veterans full authority to use the existing VA system or not. This bill means veterans, especially those with extreme disabilities, can expect to have their needs taken care of quickly and efficiently.

html: I introduced landmark reform legislation that allows veterans to choose civilian medical providers or use existing VA medical facilities, without requiring VA pre-authorization. The Veterans Empowerment Act gives veterans full authority to use the existing VA system or not.
text: I introduced landmark reform legislation that allows veterans to choose civilian medical providers or use existing VA medical facilities, without requiring VA pre-authorization. The Veterans Empowerment Act gives veterans full authority to use the existing VA system or not.
